document.full_text: former goldman sachs trader morgan sze is set to launch his highly anticipated $1 billion-plus hedge fund in hong kong on friday, three sources familiar with the plan told reuters.
document.title: ex-goldman trader launching $1 billion-plus fund: sources
lines_and_colors: former goldman sachs trader morgan sze is set to launch his highly anticipated $1 billion-plus hedge fund in hong kong on friday, three sources familiar with the plan told reuters.
